name: Project SCARF
description:
Project SCARF is a fast-paced action game set in a futuristic world controlled by a mega corporation, NoZAMA. 

You play as Platinum, who has lost everyone to this mega corporation, as you follow her story for revenge. Platinum must navigate through this futuristic city, in order to overthrow the tyrannical owner of NoZAMA. 

Slash, shoot and ‘scarf’ your way through the ranks of underpaid workers to reach the corporate overlord that ruined millions of lives. End the reign of tyranny and bring peace back to the people with precise and quick execution.

Mechanics 

  • Quick and Engaging Combat

Close combat that tests your skill

  • Difficult Platforming

Use quick movement and your scarf to navigate through the city

  • Challenging Bosses

Confront those that have wronged you and edge them out in soul-crushing boss fights 

Characters:

Platinum

Platinum is a young girl who was forcibly orphaned by Big Business. Years later all grown up, Platinum is here to settle the score and avenge her parents death. 

Big Business 

The king of business related crimes, the father of underpaid workers, and the grim reaper to all unions. He was there all those years ago to stop the enforcement of laws against his company, NoZAMA. Now he is here again to stop Platinum from fulfilling her parents wishes to end his companies reign over the city.
